variables.base_url: Base URL for the API server
variables.invalid_user_id: Invalid user ID for testing 404 errors
variables.user_diet_type: User's dietary preference type (e.g., vegetarian, vegan, balanced)
variables.excluded_ingredients: JSON array or comma-separated list of ingredients to exclude
variables.voice_room_name: LiveKit room name for voice session testing

schema_validation_added.note: Schema validation test scripts have been added to key successful requests
requests_with_schema_validation: Get Today's Meal Template (07 - Meal Templates)

data_validation_tests.note: Data validation tests have been implemented in task 12
data_validation_tests.date_time_validation: Date/Time Format Validation Test - validates ISO 8601 format for all date/time fields

error_handling_tests.note: Comprehensive error handling tests implemented in task 13
error_handling_tests.collection_level_error_validation: All error responses validate structure (detail, status_code, errors)

422_validation_errors: Submit Step with Wrong Data Types
error_types_tested.500_server_errors: Tested when applicable - database failures, unhandled exceptions
error_types_tested.503_service_unavailable: Tested when applicable - database connection failures, external service timeouts

error_response_schema.errors_structure: Array of objects with field, message, and type properties

testing_500_and_503_errors.note: 500 and 503 errors are difficult to test in a controlled environment
testing_500_and_503_errors.approach: These errors are validated by the collection-level test script when they occur
500_scenarios: Database query failures (syntax errors, constraint violations)
External service failures (AI API errors, third-party service failures)
testing_500_and_503_errors.manual_testing: To test these scenarios manually, you can temporarily disable database connections or external services
testing_500_and_503_errors.collection_level_validation: The collection-level test script automatically validates error structure for any 4xx or 5xx response

performance_validation_tests.note: Performance validation tests have been implemented in task 15
requests_with_performance_validation: Get User Profile (03 - Profiles) - validates response time < 100ms
Get Complete Workout Plan (04 - Workouts) - validates response time < 150ms
Get Today's Meal Template (07 - Meal Templates) - validates response time < 300ms
pending_performance_validation: Onboarding step submission requests - will validate response time < 200ms when implemented
Shopping list requests - will validate response time < 200ms when implemented

collection_runner_configuration.note: Collection runner is configured to track total execution time and validate 5-minute limit
collection_runner_configuration.tracking_mechanism: Collection-level pre-request script sets collection_start_time on first request
collection_runner_configuration.validation_mechanism: Collection-level test script validates elapsed time < 300000ms on every request
collection_runner_configuration.progress_logging: Logs progress every 10 requests with elapsed time
environment_variables_used: collection_start_time - timestamp when collection execution started
collection_elapsed_time - total elapsed time in milliseconds
how_it_works: 1. First request sets collection_start_time environment variable
3. Each request calculates elapsed time and stores in collection_elapsed_time
4. Each request validates elapsed time is under 5 minutes (300000ms)
5. Progress is logged to console every 10 requests
6. If any request exceeds 5-minute mark, the test fails
